context.p: A deployment is a representation of vENM in terms of the Openstack Project it will be installed in, the SED it uses and also any other information such as netsim that is necessary to deploy vENM successfully. A deployment in DIT is the means through which all the different elements come together - documents, project, pod etc.
Create a new deployment for the Deployment Inventory Tool

prereq.p: To create a new deployment the user must have the following:

ul.li: Associated Project already created in the tool
Associated documents - enm sed and any others already created in the tool

info.p: Click the deployment view from the nav bar at the top
Click the Create new deployment button
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Restrictions on the fields are as follows:

ul.li: Project must be an existing project
SED must be an existing SED

li.li: Schema Name must be existing schema

info.p: Click the Save button and you will be redirected back to the previous page
NOTE: Deployment will not save if any fields are invalid (RED in UI)

result.p: A New Deployment is created in the Deployment Inventory Tool.
